name: murders one random person every Christmas
makes your skin all wrinkly and old if you touch it or even look at it
reveals your secrets to anyone who asks
tells you a mix of lies and truths worth knowing but never lets you know which is which
that leaves you almost immediately after you've grown attached to it
makes it rain if you don't pay attention to it
makes small withdrawals from your bank account at random times
causes you to switch your favourite team if your favourite sport at random intervals
sometimes wears you as a hat
